import React from "react"; import "./PrivacyPolicy.css"; const PrivacyPolicy = () => { return (

Privacy Notice

We recognize the importance of the personal information of customers who use our shop and pay the latest attention to its handling. The information you register when using our services will be used to develop and provide attractive and valuable services.

Definition of Personal Information

We recognize that personal information is information about living individuals as stipulated in the Act on the Protection of Personal Information, such as email addresses used in connection with specific individuals, and other attribute information.

Purpose of Use

  • Sending information about the products you have purchased
  • Sending information about our new products
  • Sending questionnaires about our products

Disclosure to Third Parties

We take appropriate measures to prevent leakage of personal information. We disclose information only when required by law or necessary to protect human life, body, or property.

Management of Personal Information

We will strictly manage customers' personal information within our store to prevent leaks or unauthorized access.

); }; export default PrivacyPolicy;
